work.name: Infiniti Software
work.summary: Delivering production-ready AI, analytics, and automation solutions for enterprise clients.
highlights: Architected end-to-end AI pipelines with TensorFlow, PyTorch, YOLOv5, and OpenCV, sustaining up to 92% model accuracy.
Built scalable data pipelines and live dashboards with Tableau and Power BI, cutting data processing time by 60%.
Automated repetitive analytics workloads, improving task automation rates by 80%.

work.name: AirClass
work.summary: Coaching learners worldwide through hands-on Python and AI curricula.
highlights: Mentored 100+ students via interactive, project-based Python and AI lessons.
Guided learners in building real-world applications with PyGame and Turtle to reinforce computational thinking.

work.summary: Led applied AI research projects focused on precision agriculture and CNN optimization.
highlights: Designed crop classification and yield prediction models that achieved 99.7% training accuracy.
Optimized CNN architectures and augmentation strategies to improve deployment robustness.

work.name: Optemastech
work.summary: Delivered advanced computer vision platforms for healthcare diagnostics.
highlights: Implemented 3D medical imaging segmentation pipelines using TensorFlow and U-Net to accelerate diagnostics.
Reduced compute overhead by 12% through CUDA acceleration, model pruning, and pipeline optimization.

work.name: Bright Network UK
work.summary: Explored applied computer vision for secure identity verification.
highlights: Built a facial recognition prototype with Python and OpenCV, increasing verification accuracy by 90%.
Enhanced feature extraction via landmark detection and histogram-based filtering.
